A. VIGUERIE& RALPH BENKO| 1/27/11 3:59 AM EST The issues facing the Republican Party today look close to identical to the primary campaign between Ronald Reagan and George H.W. Bush . The National Journal recently reported, Other Republicans believe[ Mike Pence ] Mike Pence 's ideological purity is what makes him at once dangerous to his rivals in a primary and dangerous to his own party if he secures the nod in a general election. Watching this combined century of broadcasting carrying on amiably for 17 minutes, one almost- almost- felt transported back to that time

Led by defensive player-of-the-year favorite Clay Matthews with 13 1/2 sacks, the Packers are tied for second behind the Steelers in bringing down quarterbacks. Those guys fly around the ball and are always in good position, Michael Vick said of the Packers' defense.`` You just have to be ready for what they're going to do. They give you a lot of different looks and try to confuse you.''
